variantei.

</h3>

\#\#\#Repartitia binomiala

<h3>

Generarea a N = 1000 variabile aleatoare cu ajutorul repartitiei
binomiale:

</h3>

``` r
print(c(rbinom(N, n, p)))
```

\#\#\#Repartitia Poisson

Generarea a N = 1000 variabile aleatoare cu ajutorul repartitiei
Poisson:

``` r
print(c(rpois(N, lp)))
```

\#\#\#Repartitia exponentiala

Generarea a N = 1000 variabile aleatoare cu ajutorul repartitiei
exponentiale:

``` r
print(c(rexp(N, le)))
```

\#\#\#Repartitia normala

Generarea a N = 1000 variabile aleatoare cu ajutorul repartitiei
normale:

``` r
print(c(rnorm(N, mean, sd)))
```

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 2 de la problema 1

</h1>

<p>

Ilustrarea grafica a functiilor de masa/densitate ulitizand 5 seturi de
parametrii diferiti

</p>

</div>

<h3>

Functia par() foloseste la generarea mai multor grafice in aceeasi
imagine.

</h3>

<h3>

Functia plot() genereaza un grafic, iar functia lines adauga un alt
grafic la cel initial.

</h3>

<h3>

Functia legend() creeaza o legenda pentru un anumit plot.

</h3>

<h3>

Functiile dbinom, dpois, dexp, dnorm genereaza densitatea/masa fiecarei
repartitii pentru care parametri se apeleaza.

</h3>

<div>

``` r
#In aceasta functie pur si simplu se apeleaza functiile de masa din R:
#dbinom pentru Binomiala
#dpois pentru Poisson
#dexp pentru Exponentiala
#dnorm pentru Normala
afisareGraficEx2 = function() {
  old.par <- par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
  
  plot (
    xd,
    dbinom(xd, 5, 0.4),
    type = "l",
    col = "blue",
    xlab = "x",
    ylab = "Masa",
    ylim = c(0, 0.7),
    main = "Functia de masa a repartitiei binomiale"
  )
  lines (xd, dbinom(xd, 2, 0.2), col = "red", type = "l")
  lines (xd, dbinom(xd, 7, 0.3), col = "yellow", type = "l")
  lines (xd, dbinom(xd, 4, 0.2), col = "green", type = "l")
  lines (xd, dbinom(xd, 5, 0.5), col = "purple", type = "l")
  legend (
    "topright",
    c(
      expression(paste(Beta, "(5, 0.4)")),
      expression(paste(Beta, "(2, 0.2)")),
      expression(paste(Beta, "(7, 0.3)")),
      expression(paste(Beta, "(4, 0.2)")),
      expression(paste(Beta, "(5, 0.5)"))
    ),
    col = c("blue", "red", "yellow", "green", "purple"),
    lty = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1),
    lwd = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
  )
  
  plot (
    xd,
    dpois(xd, 0.5),
    type = "l",
    col = "blue",
    xlab = "x",
    ylab = "Masa",
    ylim = c(0, 0.9),
    main = "Functia de masa a repartitiei Poisson"
  )
  lines (xd, dpois(xd, 0.3), col = "red", type = "l")
  lines (xd, dpois(xd, 0.2), col = "yellow", type = "l")
  lines (xd, dpois(xd, 0.1), col = "green", type = "l")
  lines (xd, dpois(xd, 0.6), col = "purple", type = "l")
  legend(
    "topright",
    c(
      expression(paste(Rho, "(0.5)")),
      expression(paste(Rho, "(0.3)")),
      expression(paste(Rho, "(0.2)")),
      expression(paste(Rho, "(0.1)")),
      expression(paste(Rho, "(0.6)"))
    ),
    col = c("blue", "red", "yellow", "green", "purple"),
    lty = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1),
    lwd = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
  )
  
  plot (
    xc,
    dexp(xc, 0.2),
    type = "l",
    col = "blue",
    xlab = "x",
    ylab = "Densitate",
    main = "Functia densitate a repartitiei exponentiale"
  )
  lines (xc, dexp(xc, 0.6), col = "red", type = "l")
  lines (xc, dexp(xc, 0.3), col = "yellow", type = "l")
  lines (xc, dexp(xc, 0.9), col = "green", type = "l")
  lines (xc, dexp(xc, 0.5), col = "purple", type = "l")
  legend(
    "topright",
    c(
      expression(paste(Epsilon, "(0.2)")),
      expression(paste(Epsilon, "(0.6)")),
      expression(paste(Epsilon, "(0.3)")),
      expression(paste(Epsilon, "(0.9)")),
      expression(paste(Epsilon, "(0.5)"))
    ),
    col = c("blue", "red", "yellow", "green", "purple"),
    lty = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1),
    lwd = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
  )
  
  plot (
    xc,
    dnorm(xc, 3, 0.4),
    type = "l",
    col = "blue",
    xlab = "x",
    ylab = "Densitate",
    xlim = c(0, 8),
    ylim = c(0, 3),
    main = "Functia densitate a repartitiei normale"
  )
  lines (xc, dnorm(xc, 4, 0.4), col = "red", type = "l")
  lines (xc, dnorm(xc, 1, 0.3), col = "yellow", type = "l")
  lines (xc, dnorm(xc, 5, 0.9), col = "green", type = "l")
  lines (xc, dnorm(xc, 6, 0.2), col = "purple", type = "l")
  legend(
    "topright",
    c(
      expression(paste(Nu, "(3, 0.4)")),
      expression(paste(Nu, "(4, 0.4)")),
      expression(paste(Nu, "(1, 0.3)")),
      expression(paste(Nu, "(5, 0.9)")),
      expression(paste(Nu, "(6, 0.2)"))
    ),
    col = c("blue", "red", "yellow", "green", "purple"),
    lty = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1),
    lwd = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
  )
  
  par(old.par)
}
afisareGraficEx2()
```

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 3 de la problema 1

</h1>

</div>

<h2>

Functiile de repartitie pentru cele 5 seturi de parametrii diferiti

<h2>

<h3>

Functiile pbinom, ppois, pexp, pnorm genereaza repartitiile
corespunzatoare.

</h3>

<div>

``` r
#In aceasta functie pur si simplu se apeleaza functiile de repartitie din R:
#pbinom pentru Binomiala
#ppois pentru Poisson
#pexp pentru Exponentiala
#pnorm pentru Normala

afisareGraficEx3 = function() {
  old.par <- par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
  
  #Functia de repartitie binomiala
  plot (
    xd,
    pbinom(xd, 2, 0.3),
    type = "l",
    col = "blue",
    xlab = "x",
    ylab = "Repartitie",
    main = "Functia de repartitie binomiala"
  )
  lines (xd, pbinom(xd, 4, 0.2), col = "red", type = "l")
  lines (xd, pbinom(xd, 1, 0.1), col = "yellow", type = "l")
  lines (xd, pbinom(xd, 5, 0.5), col = "green", type = "l")
  lines (xd, pbinom(xd, 7, 0.4), col = "purple", type = "l")
  legend (
    "topright",
    c(
      expression(paste(Beta, "(2, 0.3)")),
      expression(paste(Beta, "(4, 0.2)")),
      expression(paste(Beta, "(1, 0.1)")),
      expression(paste(Beta, "(5, 0.5)")),
      expression(paste(Beta, "(7, 0.4)"))
    ),
    col = c("blue", "red", "yellow", "green", "purple"),
    lty = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1),
    lwd = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
  )
  
  #Functia de repartitie Poisson
  plot (
    xd,
    ppois(xd, 0.3),
    type = "l",
    col = "blue",
    xlab = "x",
    ylab = "Repartitie",
    main = "Functia de repartitie Poisson"
  )
  lines (xd, ppois(xd, 0.4), col = "red", type = "l")
  lines (xd, ppois(xd, 0.5), col = "yellow", type = "l")
  lines (xd, ppois(xd, 0.1), col = "green", type = "l")
  lines (xd, ppois(xd, 0.2), col = "purple", type = "l")
  legend(
    "topright",
    c(
      expression(paste(Rho, "(0.3)")),
      expression(paste(Rho, "(0.4)")),
      expression(paste(Rho, "(0.5)")),
      expression(paste(Rho, "(0.1)")),
      expression(paste(Rho, "(0.2)"))
    ),
    col = c("blue", "red", "yellow", "green", "purple"),
    lty = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1),
    lwd = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
  )
  
  #Functia de repartitie exponentiala
  plot (
    xc,
    pexp(xc, 0.4),
    type = "l",
    col = "blue",
    xlab = "x",
    ylab = "Repartitie",
    xlim = c(0, 8),
    main = "Functia de repartitie exponentiala"
  )
  lines (xc, pexp(xc, 0.5), col = "red", type = "l")
  lines (xc, pexp(xc, 0.3), col = "yellow", type = "l")
  lines (xc, pexp(xc, 0.1), col = "green", type = "l")
  lines (xc, pexp(xc, 0.8), col = "purple", type = "l")
  legend(
    "topright",
    c(
      expression(paste(Epsilon, "(0.4)")),
      expression(paste(Epsilon, "(0.5)")),
      expression(paste(Epsilon, "(0.3)")),
      expression(paste(Epsilon, "(0.1)")),
      expression(paste(Epsilon, "(0.8)"))
    ),
    col = c("blue", "red", "yellow", "green", "purple"),
    lty = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1),
    lwd = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
  )
  
  #Functia  de repartitie normala
  plot (
    xc,
    pnorm(xc, 2, 0.3),
    type = "l",
    col = "blue",
    xlab = "x",
    ylab = "Repartitie",
    xlim = c(0, 8),
    ylim = c(0, 1.1),
    main = "Functia  de repartitie normala"
  )
  lines (xc, pnorm(xc, 3, 0.4), col = "red", type = "l")
  lines (xc, pnorm(xc, 2, 0.6), col = "yellow", type = "l")
  lines (xc, pnorm(xc, 5, 0.5), col = "green", type = "l")
  lines (xc, pnorm(xc, 1, 0.2), col = "purple", type = "l")
  legend(
    "topright",
    c(
      expression(paste(Nu, "(2, 0.3)")),
      expression(paste(Nu, "(3, 0.4)")),
      expression(paste(Nu, "(2, 0.6)")),
      expression(paste(Nu, "(5, 0.5)")),
      expression(paste(Nu, "(1, 0.2)"))
    ),
    col = c("blue", "red", "yellow", "green", "purple"),
    lty = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1),
    lwd = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
  )
  
  
  par(old.par)
}
afisareGraficEx3()
```

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 4 de la problema 1

</h1>

<div class="afisare">

``` r
#librarii necesare pentru afisare
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)
library(ggplot2)

#Aproximarea Camp-Paulson
CPaul = function(n, p, k) {
  a = 1 / (9 * (n - k))
  b = 1 / (9 * (k + 1))
  r = ((k + 1 * (1 - p))) / (p * (n - k))
  c = (1 - b) * (r ^ (1 / 3))
  u = 1 - a
  val = r ^ (2 / 3)
  val = val * b
  val = a + b
  sgm = sqrt(val)
  return (dnorm(sgm))
}

#Avem o matrice pe care o afisam ca tabel
#Iar aici facem umplerea "tabelului" cu valorile corespunzatoare
AppBP = function(n,p,a,b){
  lambda = n*p
  x = matrix(numeric((b-a+1)*6),ncol=6,
             dimnames = list(a:b,c( 
               "k",
               "Binomiala",
               "Poisson",
               "Normala",
               "Normala C",
               "Camp"
             )))
  q = 1 - p
  # binom, poison
  x[,1] = 1:10
  x[,2] = dbinom(a:b,n,p)
  x[,3] = dpois(a:b,lambda)
  # normala
  for(k in seq_len(nrow(x))) {
    
    aux= rnorm(n, n * p, sqrt(n * p * q)) # generare n v.a. normale de medie np 
    z1 = ((k + .5) - mean(aux))/sd(aux) # cu coeficient de corectie
    z2= (k - mean(aux)/sd(aux)) # fara coeficient de corectie
    x[k, 4] = dnorm(z1);
    x[k, 5] = dnorm(z2);
  }
  for(i in seq_len(nrow(x)))
    x[i, 6] = CPaul(n, p, i)
  
  return (x)
}

#tinerea minte a rezultatelor
primRez = AppBP(25, 0.05, 1, 10)
doiRez = AppBP(25, 0.1, 1, 10)
treiRez = AppBP(50, 0.05, 1, 10)
patruRez = AppBP(50, 0.1, 1, 10)
cinciRez = AppBP(100, 0.05, 1, 10)
saseRez = AppBP(100, 0.1, 1, 10)

#afisarea rezultatelor
grid.arrange(top = "Valori comparative\n n = 25 si p = 0.05 (prima) si n = 25 si p = 0.1 (a doua)",
             tableGrob(primRez), tableGrob(doiRez),
             nrow = 2, ncol = 1)
```

``` r
             nrow = 2, ncol = 1)
```

``` r
#Calculul penru distanta Kolmogorov
distKolm = function(x, k) {
  rez = 0;   
  val = 0
  for(i in seq_len(ncol(x))) {
    val = x[k, 2] - x[k, i]
    val = abs(val);
    
    rez = val;
  }
  return (rez)
}

#umplere vector cu valori corespunzatoare pentru afisare
fdexretr = function(n, nrCol){
  vecP = seq(0.01, 0.5, length.out = 100)
  fdex = 1:100
  poz = 1
  
  for(p in vecP){
    x = AppBP(n, p, 1, 10);
    fp = distKolm(x, nrCol)
    fdex[poz] = fp
    poz = poz + 1
  }
  
  return (fdex)
}


###################################### Grafic cand n = 25 ################## 

par(mfrow=c(2,2))

vecP = seq(0.01, 0.5, length.out = 100)

n = 25

#apelare a functiei fdexretr pentru fiecare din cei 4 vectori
fdexunu = fdexretr(n, 3)
fdexdoi = fdexretr(n, 4)
fdextrei = fdexretr(n, 5)
fdexpatru = fdexretr(n, 6)

#afisare cu plot si 3 "lines"
plot(vecP, fdexunu, type = "p", col = "blue",
     xlab = "p de la 0.01 la 0.5",
     ylab = "Distanta Kolmogorov",
     main = "n = 25")


lines(vecP, fdexdoi, col = "red", type = "p")
lines(vecP, fdextrei, col = "yellow", type = "p")
lines(vecP, fdexpatru, col = "green", type = "p")

legend ("topright", c(expression(paste(Poisson, "")), 
                      expression(paste(Normala, "")), 
                      expression(paste(Normala_C, "")), 
                      expression(paste(Camp-Paulson, ""))), 
        col = c("blue", "red", "yellow", "green"), 
        lty = c(1, 1, 1, 1), 
        lwd = c(1, 1, 1, 1))
```

``` r
#calculul densitatii de repartitie
densDeRep = function(miu, scala, lambda, x){
  prim = 2/scala;
  doi = (x - miu)/scala
  trei = (lambda * (x - miu))/scala
  
  tetamic = dnorm(doi)
  tetamare = pnorm(trei)
  
  return (prim * tetamic * doi * tetamare * trei)
}

x = 1:10
fpentruxunu = 1:10
fpentruxdoi = 1:10
fpentruxtrei = 1:10
fpentruxpatru = 1:10
fpentruxcinci = 1:10

#umplere vectori cu valori corespunzatoare 
#precis, umplem intoarcem vectorul fpentrux care este 
#densitatea de repartitie pentru parametrii miu, scala, lambda, x primiti
getyourValue = function(miu, scala, lambda, x){
  
  fpentrux = 1:10
  poz = 1
  for(p in x){
    fpentrux[poz] = densDeRep(miu, scala, lambda, p)
    poz = poz + 1
  }
  
  return (fpentrux)
}

#apelare a functiei getYourValue pentru fiecare din cei 5 vectori
fpentruxunu = getyourValue(3, 4, 5, x)
fpentruxdoi = getyourValue(4, 5, 6, x)
fpentruxtrei = getyourValue(5, 6, 7, x)
fpentruxpatru = getyourValue(6, 7, 8, x)
fpentruxcinci = getyourValue(7, 8, 9, x)

#afisarea graficului Densitatii repartitiei normal-asimetrice
plot(x, fpentruxunu,
     type = "l", col = "blue",
     xlab = "x",
     ylab = "f(x)",
     main = "Densitatea repartitiei normal-asimetrica\n Valori: miu, scala, lambda")



lines(x, fpentruxdoi, col = "red", type = "l")
lines(x, fpentruxtrei, col = "yellow", type = "l")
lines(x, fpentruxpatru, col = "green", type = "l")
lines(x, fpentruxcinci, col = "violet", type = "l")

legend ("topright", c(expression(paste(Valori, ": 3, 4, 5")), 
                      expression(paste(Valori, ": 4, 5, 6")), 
                      expression(paste(Valori, ": 5, 6, 7")), 
                      expression(paste(Valori, ": 6, 7, 8")),
                      expression(paste(Valori, ": 7, 8, 9"))), 
        col = c("blue", "red", "yellow", "green", "violet"), 
        lty = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1), 
        lwd = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1))
```

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 7 de la Problema 1

``` r
#librarie pentru functii matematice
library(pracma)

#in principal, functiile de mai jos calculeaza aproximarea prin normala asimetrica
#si sunt sectionate pentru a calcula fiecare cate ceva, iar in final
#functia afisare plot apeleaza aceste functii pentru a umple cu valori
#vectorii care vor fi afisati la barplot

lambdaApelare <- 1
ceVomApela = function(t){
  
  tetaMic = dnorm(t)
  tetaMare = pnorm(lambdaApelare*t)
  
  return (tetaMic * tetaMare * 2)
}

thetaMareIntegrala = function (x){
  return (integral(ceVomApela, -Inf,  x, reltol = 1e-12))
  
}

functieDeNormalaAsimetrica = function(k, miu, scala){
  prim = (k + 0.5 - as.numeric(miu))/scala
  
  return (thetaMareIntegrala(prim))
}

#functie pentru aflarea de lambda, sigma si miu pentru parametrii n si p primiti
findLamdaSigmaNiu = function (n, p){
  
  prim = (n*p*(1 - p))/((1 - 2*p)*(1 - 2*p))
  
  f1 <- function(lmb) (1 - 2 / pi * (lmb * lmb) / (1 + lmb * lmb)) ^ 3
  f2 <- function(lmb) (2 / pi * ((4 / pi - 1) ^ 2)) * 
    (((lmb ^ 2) / (1 + lmb ^ 2)) ^ 3)
  f <- function (lmb) f2(lmb) * prim - f1(lmb)
  lw = 0
  up = 9000000000
  lamda <- uniroot(f, lower = lw, upper = up, tol = 1e-10, extendInt = "yes")$root
  lamda = sqrt(lamda) * sign(1 - 2 * p)
  
  sigma = (n * p * (1 - p)) /
    (1 - (2 / pi) * (lamda ^ 2 /
                       (1 + lamda ^ 2)))
  sigma = sqrt(sigma)
  niu = n * p - sigma * sqrt(2 / pi * (lamda ^ 2 / (1 + lamda ^ 2)))
  return(list(lamda, sigma, niu))
}

#calcul densitate de repartitie pentru parametri dati
densDeRep = function(miu, scala, lambda, x){
  prim = 2/scala;
  doi = (x - miu)/scala
  trei = (lambda * (x - miu))/scala
  
  tetamic = dnorm(doi)
  tetamare = pnorm(trei)
  
  return (prim * tetamic * doi * tetamare * trei)
}

pentruAfisarePlot = function(n, p, titlu){
  #obtinere coordonate x
  coordx = 0:10
  
  #obtinere valori pentru binomiala pentru x
  binomiala = dbinom(0:10, n, p)
  
  #obtinere valori pentru asimetrica
  apel = findLamdaSigmaNiu(n, p)
  lambdaApelare <<- apel[[1]]
  
  asimetrica = 0:10
  poz = 1
  
  for(i in asimetrica){
    asimetrica[poz] = densDeRep(apel[[3]], apel[[2]], lambdaApelare, poz)
    poz = poz + 1
  }
  
  
  #asimetrica = functieDeNormalaAsimetrica(p, apel[[3]], apel[[2]])
  
  #afisare
  mtx = matrix(c(binomiala, asimetrica), nrow = length(coordx), ncol = 2, dimnames = list(coordx, c("binomiala", "asimetrica")))
  
  mtx = t(mtx)
  barplot(mtx, col=c("red", "darkblue"), beside = T, main = titlu)
}

par(mfrow=c(2, 2))

pentruAfisarePlot(25, 0.05, "Binomiala (rosu) vs Asimetrica (albastru) \n n = 25 si p = 0.05")
pentruAfisarePlot(25, 0.1, "Binomiala (rosu) vs Asimetrica (albastru) \n n = 25 si p = 0.1")
pentruAfisarePlot(50, 0.05, "Binomiala (rosu) vs Asimetrica (albastru) \n n = 50 si p = 0.05")
pentruAfisarePlot(50, 0.1, "Binomiala (rosu) vs Asimetrica (albastru) \n n = 50 si p = 0.1")
```

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 1 de la Problema 2

</h1>

</div>

<div class="afisare">

<h4 class="forH1">

Justificare

</h4>

<h5>

Fie (x,y) un vector aleator repartizat uniform pe \[ [-1, 1]^2 .\] <br>
Functia de densitate este egala cu \[f(X,Y)(x, y) = 1/4,\] daca
\[x, y \in [-1, 1],\] si 0, in caz contrar. <br> <br> Fie 2 variabile
aleatoare A, B. Functia de densitate pentru fiecare: \[f(A)(a) = 1/2,\]
daca \[ a\in [-1, 0]\] si 0, in caz contrar, iar pentru B,
\[f(B)(b) = 1/2\] daca \[b \in [0, 1].\] <br> Cum A si B sunt
independente, \[P(A = a, B = b) = P(A = a) * P(B = b) = 1/2 * 1/2 \],
daca \[a, b \in [-1, 1]\] si 0, in caz contrar. <br> <br>In concluzie,
simularea are loc pentru ca densitatile celor 2 functii sunt egale.

</h5>

</div>

<div>

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 2 de la Problema 2

</h1>

</div>

<div class="afisare">

``` r
library(plotrix)
 
f = function(x, y) {
  return (sqrt(x ^ 2 + y^2))
}
 
#Functia gen va genera n puncte pe discul D(1) repartizate uniform. Se va folosi metoda respingerii si acceptari
#unde E = multimea punctelor de pe discul D(1), iar F = [-1, 1] ^ 2
 
 gen = function(n) {
 
  set.seed(n)
 
  #declaram 2 vectori de lungime n : vecx si vecy
  # astfel generam n puncte : punctul i cu i de la 1 la n este (vecx[i], vecy[i])
  vecx = 1:n
  vecy=1:n
  got=1 # indexul punctului care urmeaza sa fie adaugat (la orice moment avem got - 1 puncte adaugate)
 
 
  while(got<= n){ # cat timp avem mai putin de n puncte
 
    x=runif(1, -1, 1)
    y=runif(1, -1, 1)
 
    # generam x si y aleatori cu repartitia uniforma
 
    if(x^2+y^2 <= 1) #daca (x, y) e pe discul D(1) -> adica x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 <= 1
    {
      #Adaugam punctele in vectorii corespunzatori
      vecx[got] = x
      vecy[got] = y
      #Marim indexul urmatorului punct cu 1.
      got = got + 1
    }
  }
  return(list(vecx, vecy))
}
 
#functie pentru afisarea primului cerc - cel cu conditia x^2+y^2 <= 1
#punctele din interior - albastru
#punctele ~de pe contur - rosu
showCircle = function(n){
  N = n
  t = gen(N)
  #luam vectorii xvec si yvec returnati de functia gen(N)
  xvec = t[[1]]
  yvec = t[[2]]
 
  plot(xvec, yvec, asp = 1, xlim = c(-1, 1), col = "blue", main = "Generare din [-1,1] \n cu conditia x^2+y^2 <= 1")
 
 
  #obtinere 2 vectori pentru a desena cu rosu
  noux = 1:1000
  fdex = 1:1000
  poz = 1 # pozitia curenta pe care o procesam in (xvec, yvec)
  pozVec = 1 # pozitia curenta pe care o procesam in (noux, fdex) ,
 
  for(i in noux){
    #verificam daca e pe marginea cercului - dar cu o eroare de precizie setata de noi
    if((xvec[poz]^2 + yvec[poz]^2) >= 0.95 && (xvec[poz]^2 + yvec[poz]^2) <=1.10){
 
      noux[pozVec] = xvec[poz]
      fdex[pozVec] = yvec[poz]
 
      pozVec = pozVec + 1  
    }
    poz = poz + 1
  }
  lines(noux, fdex, col = "red", type = "p")
  draw.circle(0, 0, 1, nv = 1000, border = "black", col = NA, lty = 1, lwd = 2)
}
 
#functie pentru afisarea celui de-al doilea cerc - cel fara conditie
#punctele din interior - albastru
#punctele din afara - rosu
showCircleDoi = function(n){
  x = runif(n, -1, 1)
  y = runif(n, -1, 1)
  # x si y contin cate n v.a. repartizate uniform pe [-1, 1]
  plot(x, y, asp = 1, xlim=c(-1,1), col = "blue", main = "Generare din [-1, 1] \nfara conditie")
 
  #initializam 2 vectori de 1000 elemente
  noux = 1:1000
  fdex = 1:1000
  poz = 1
  pozVec = 1
 
  for(i in noux){
    #e pe margine?
    if((x[poz]^2 + y[poz]^2) > 1){
 
      noux[pozVec] = x[poz]
      fdex[pozVec] = y[poz]
 
      pozVec = pozVec + 1  
    }
    poz = poz + 1
  }
  lines(noux, fdex, col = "red", type = "p")
 
  draw.circle(0, 0, 1, nv = 1000, border = "black", col = NA, lty = 1, lwd = 2)
}
 
par(mfrow=c(2, 2))
showCircle(1000)
showCircleDoi(1000)
```

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 3 de la Problema 2

</h1>

</div>

<div class="afisare">

``` r
#Rezolvarea cerintei Calculati media aritmetica a distantei care separa cele N puncte de origine. Comparati rezultatul cu
#media teoretica a variabilei corespunzatoare.
 
cir = function(N) {
  t = gen(N)
  xvec = t[[1]]
  yvec = t[[2]]
  suma = 0
  for(i in 1 : N)
    suma = suma+ sqrt(xvec[i] ^ 2 + yvec[i] ^ 2)
 
  print("Valoarea teoretica ar trebuie sa fie:")
  print(sqrt(4 / 3))
  print("Valoarea obtinuta: ")
  print(suma / N)
}
 
cir(1000)
```

    ## [1] "Valoarea teoretica ar trebuie sa fie:"
    ## [1] 1.154701
    ## [1] "Valoarea obtinuta: "
    ## [1] 0.6745071

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 4 de la Problema 2

</h1>

<div class="afisare">

<script type="text/x-mathjax-config">
  MathJax.Hub.Config({tex2jax: {inlineMath: [['$','$'], ['\\(','\\)']]}});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript"

<p>

Calcul pentru aflarea lui R

</p>

\[ \frac{1}{\pi \:}\int _0^{2\cdot \:\pi \:}rd\theta \:=\:2\cdot r \]

<p>

Calcul pentru aflarea lui theta

</p>

\[  \frac{1}{\pi }\int _0^1pdp\:=\:\frac{1}{2\cdot \pi } \]

</div>

<div>

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 5 de la Problema 2

</h1>

</div>

<p>

Pentru acest exercitiu trebuie sa generam un R si un Theta, si sa
aplicam transformarile \[ X\:=\:Rcos\theta \] , \[ Y\:=\:Rsin\theta \]

</p>

<div class="afisare">

``` r
# Pentru 5: trebuie sa generam un R si un Theta, si sa aplicam transformarile
# X = RCosT, Y = RsinT
 
drawSecondCircle = function (N){
 
  #generam 1000 de puncte de raza de la 0 la 1
  raza = runif(1000, 0, 1) #r va fi de la 0 la 1
  #generam 1000 de puncte de unghi theta de la 0 la 2*pi
  y = runif(1000, 0, 2*pi) 
 
  vecx = 1:1000
  vecy = 1:1000
  poz = 1
 
  #obtinere puncte care vor fi pe grafic
  for(i in vecx){
    vecx[poz] = raza[poz]*cos(y[poz])
    vecy[poz] = raza[poz]*sin(y[poz])
 
    poz = poz + 1
  }
 
  #afisare
  plot(vecx, vecy, asp = 1, xlim = c(-1, 1), col = "blue", main = "Simularea a N = 1000 puncte \n cu X = R cos(O) si Y = R sin(O)")
  draw.circle(0, 0, 1, nv = 1000, border = "black", col = NA, lty = 1, lwd = 2)
}
 
drawSecondCircle(1000)
```

</div>

<div>

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 1 de la Problema 3

</h1>

</div>

<p>

Implementarea proprietatilor integralei gamma

</p>

<div class="afisare">

``` r
#Implementarea integralei gamma
 
gamValue = function(x, b) {
  e = exp(1)
 
  return (e ^ (-x) * (x ^ (b - 1)))
}
 
fgam = function(x) {
  #Implementam conform definitiei.
  x = as.numeric(x)
  if (x == 1)
    return (1)
  if (x == (1 / 2))
    return (sqrt(pi))
  if (round(x) == x)
    return (factorial(x - 1))
  if (x > 1) {
    return (fgam(x - 1) * (x - 1))
  }
  # x < 1. Folosim functia integrate.
  return (integrate(Vectorize(gamValue),
                    lower = 0,
                    upper = Inf, x)$value)
}
```

</div>

<div>

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 2 de la Problema 3

</h1>

</div>

<p>

Implementarea proprietatilor integralei beta

</p>

<div class="afisare">

``` r
#Implementarea integralei beta
 
fbeta = function(a, b) {
  if (a + b == 1 && a > 0 && b > 0) {
    return (pi / (sin(a * pi)))
  }
  return (fgam(a) * fgam(b)) /
    fgam(a + b)
}
```

</div>

<div>

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 3 de la Problema 3

</h1>

</div>

<div class="afisare">

``` r
#calculul celor 9 probabilitati cu ajutorul altor 2 functii implementate acum GamAB si BetaAB
 
GamAB = function(x, a, b) {
  #verificam conditiile pt x,a , b
  if (x <= 0 || a <= 0 || b <= 0)
    return (0)
  return ((1 / (b ^ a * fgam(a)))
          * (x ^ (a - 1)) * exp(-x / b))
}
 
BetaAB = function(x, a , b) {
  #verificam onditiile pt x, a, b
  if (x <= 0 || x >= 1 || a <= 0 || b <= 0)
    return (0)
  return ((1 / (fbeta(a, b)))
          * (x ^ (a - 1)) * ((1 - x) ^ (b - 1)))
}
 
GamBetw = function(a, b, c, d) {
  #Returneaza integrala Gama(a, b) (incompleta) intre c si d
 
  return (integrate(Vectorize(GamAB), lower = c, upper = d, a, b)$value)
}
BetaBetw = function(a, b, c, d) {
  # Returneaza integrala Beta(a, b) (incompleta) intre c si d
  return (integrate(Vectorize(BetaAB), lower = c, upper = d, a, b)$value)
}
fprobgamma1 = function(a, b) {
  # Se cere P(X < 3). Este egal cu integrala Gama(a, b) incompleta intre 0 si 3
  return (GamBetw(a, b, 0, 3))
}
 
fprobgamma2 = function(a, b) {
  # P(2 < X < 5) . E egal cu Gama(a, b) incomplet intre si 2 5
  return(GamBetw(a, b, 2, 5))
}
 
fprobgamma3 = function(a, b) {
  # ) P(3 < X < 4 | X > 2). Folosim formula P(A | B) = P(A si B) / P(B), A intersectat c B e chiar (3 < X < 4)
 
  return(GamBetw(a, b, 3, 4) / GamBetw(a, b, 2, Inf))
}
 
fprobbeta4 = function(a, b) {
  # P(Y > 2) inseamna beta incomplet superior de 2
  return(BetaBetw(a, b, 2, Inf))
}
fprobgamma5 = function(a, b) {
  # P(4 < X < 5)
  return(GamBetw(a, b, 4, 6))
}
fprobgamma6 = function(a, b) {
  # P(0 < X < 1 | X < 7) daca A = (0 < X < 1) B = (X < 7) atunci A intersectat cu B e (0 < X < 1)
  return(GamBetw(a, b, 0, 1) / GamBetw(a, b, 0, 7))
}
 
fprod = function(x, a, b) {
  return(GamAB(x, a, b) * BetaAB(x, a, b))
}
 
 
fint7 = function(x, a, b) {
  #ne integreaza functia fprod de la 0 la 5 - x, o folosim mai jos pt a calcula o integrala dubla
  #aici si la fint7,fint8,fint9 la integrate dam parametrii a si b pt functia fprod
  return(integrate(Vectorize(fprod), lower = 0, upper = 5 - x,
                   a, b)$value)
}
fint8 = function(x, a, b) {
  if (max(0, x - 0.5) > 1)
    return (0)
  #daca x - 0.5 e > 1 cum noi integram intre x-0.5 si 1 ne va da 0 integrala, returnam 0 deja
  return(integrate(
    Vectorize(fprod),
    lower = max(0, x - 0.5),
    upper = min(1, x),
    a,
    b
  )$value)
}
fint9 = function(x, a, b) {
  if (max(0, 3 - x) > 1)
    return (0)
  #analog cufint8,fint7
  return(integrate(
    Vectorize(fprod),
    lower = max(0, 3 - x),
    upper = min(1, x),
    a,
    b
  )$value)
}
fprobnr7 = function(a, b) {
  #P(X + Y) < 5 ?
  #Rsapunsul va fi o integrala dubla, mai exact
  #integrala de la 0 la 5 integrala de la 0 la 5 5 din fprod(x, a, b)dxdy
 
  return(integrate(Vectorize(fint7), lower = 0, upper = 5, a, b)$value)
}
 
fprobnr8 = function(a, b) {
  #aici am calculat P(X - Y <- 0.5) : integrala de la 0 la inf integrala de la max(0, x - 0.5) la x din fprod dxdy
  val = integrate(Vectorize(fint8), lower = 0, upper = Inf, a, b)$value
  # si dupa P(X - Y > 0.5) = 1 - P(X - Y < 0.5)
  val = (1 - val)
  return(val)
}
fprobnr9 = function(a, b) {
  up = integrate(Vectorize(fint9), lower = 0, upper = 3, a, b)$value
  down = fprobnr8(a, b)
 
  return (up / down)
}
 
demonstratieEx3Prob4 = function(a,b,mtx){
  specify_decimal <- function(x, k) trimws(format(round(x, k), nsmall=k))
  #Aici pt fiecare functie luam cate 9 valori ale lui a si b.
  #Pt fiecare functie punem toate rezultatele pe o coloana(deci o anumita coloana si liniile 1, 2.... 9)
  #coloana 3
  mtx[1, 3] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma1(a, b), 5)
  mtx[2, 3] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma1(a + 1, b), 5)
  mtx[3, 3] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma1(a, b + 1), 5)
  mtx[4, 3] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma1(a - 1, b), 5)
  mtx[5, 3] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma1(a, b - 1), 5)
  mtx[6, 3] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma1(a + 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[7, 3] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma1(a, b + 0.5), 5)
  mtx[8, 3] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma1(a - 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[9, 3] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma1(a, b - 0.5), 5)
 
  #coloana 4
  mtx[1, 4] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma2(a, b), 5)
  mtx[2, 4] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma2(a + 1, b), 5)
  mtx[3, 4] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma2(a, b + 1), 5)
  mtx[4, 4] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma2(a - 1, b), 5)
  mtx[5, 4] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma2(a, b - 1), 5)
  mtx[6, 4] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma2(a + 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[7, 4] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma2(a, b + 0.5), 5)
  mtx[8, 4] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma2(a - 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[9, 4] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma2(a, b - 0.5), 5)
 
  #coloana 5
  mtx[1, 5] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma3(a, b), 5)
  mtx[2, 5] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma3(a + 1, b), 5)
  mtx[3, 5] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma3(a, b + 1), 5)
  mtx[4, 5] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma3(a - 1, b), 5)
  mtx[5, 5] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma3(a, b - 1), 5)
  mtx[6, 5] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma3(a + 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[7, 5] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma3(a, b + 0.5), 5)
  mtx[8, 5] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma3(a - 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[9, 5] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma3(a, b - 0.5), 5)
 
  #coloana 6
  mtx[1, 6] = specify_decimal(fprobbeta4(a, b), 5)
  mtx[2, 6] = specify_decimal(fprobbeta4(a + 1, b), 5)
  mtx[3, 6] = specify_decimal(fprobbeta4(a, b + 1), 5)
  mtx[4, 6] = specify_decimal(fprobbeta4(a - 1, b), 5)
  mtx[5, 6] = specify_decimal(fprobbeta4(a, b - 1), 5)
  mtx[6, 6] = specify_decimal(fprobbeta4(a + 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[7, 6] = specify_decimal(fprobbeta4(a, b + 0.5), 5)
  mtx[8, 6] = specify_decimal(fprobbeta4(a - 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[9, 6] = specify_decimal(fprobbeta4(a, b - 0.5), 5)
 
  #coloana 7
  mtx[1, 7] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma5(a, b), 5)
  mtx[2, 7] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma5(a + 1, b), 5)
  mtx[3, 7] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma5(a, b + 1), 5)
  mtx[4, 7] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma5(a - 1, b), 5)
  mtx[5, 7] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma5(a, b - 1), 5)
  mtx[6, 7] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma5(a + 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[7, 7] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma5(a, b + 0.5), 5)
  mtx[8, 7] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma5(a - 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[9, 7] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma5(a, b - 0.5), 5)
 
  #coloana 8
  mtx[1, 8] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma6(a, b), 5)
  mtx[2, 8] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma6(a + 1, b), 5)
  mtx[3, 8] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma6(a, b + 1), 5)
  mtx[4, 8] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma6(a - 1, b), 5)
  mtx[5, 8] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma6(a, b - 1), 5)
  mtx[6, 8] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma6(a + 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[7, 8] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma6(a, b + 0.5), 5)
  mtx[8, 8] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma6(a - 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[9, 8] = specify_decimal(fprobgamma6(a, b - 0.5), 5)
 
  #coloana 9
  mtx[1, 9] = specify_decimal(fprobnr7(a, b), 5)
  mtx[2, 9] = specify_decimal(fprobnr7(a + 1, b), 5)
  mtx[3, 9] = specify_decimal(fprobnr7(a, b + 1), 5)
  mtx[4, 9] = specify_decimal(fprobnr7(a - 1, b), 5)
  mtx[5, 9] = specify_decimal(fprobnr7(a, b - 1), 5)
  mtx[6, 9] = specify_decimal(fprobnr7(a + 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[7, 9] = specify_decimal(fprobnr7(a, b + 0.5), 5)
  mtx[8, 9] = specify_decimal(fprobnr7(a - 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[9, 9] = specify_decimal(fprobnr7(a, b - 0.5), 5)
 
  #coloana 10
  mtx[1, 10] = specify_decimal(fprobnr8(a, b), 5)
  mtx[2, 10] = specify_decimal(fprobnr8(a + 1, b), 5)
  mtx[3, 10] = specify_decimal(fprobnr8(a, b + 1), 5)
  mtx[4, 10] = specify_decimal(fprobnr8(a - 1, b), 5)
  mtx[5, 10] = specify_decimal(fprobnr8(a, b - 1), 5)
  mtx[6, 10] = specify_decimal(fprobnr8(a + 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[7, 10] = specify_decimal(fprobnr8(a, b + 0.5), 5)
  mtx[8, 10] = specify_decimal(fprobnr8(a - 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[9, 10] = specify_decimal(fprobnr8(a, b - 0.5), 5)
 
  #coloana 11
  mtx[1, 11] = specify_decimal(fprobnr9(a, b), 5)
  mtx[2, 11] = specify_decimal(fprobnr9(a + 1, b), 5)
  mtx[3, 11] = specify_decimal(fprobnr9(a, b + 1), 5)
  mtx[4, 11] = specify_decimal(fprobnr9(a - 1, b), 5)
  mtx[5, 11] = specify_decimal(fprobnr9(a, b - 1), 5)
  mtx[6, 11] = specify_decimal(fprobnr9(a + 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[7, 11] = specify_decimal(fprobnr9(a, b + 0.5), 5)
  mtx[8, 11] = specify_decimal(fprobnr9(a - 0.5, b), 5)
  mtx[9, 11] = specify_decimal(fprobnr9(a, b - 0.5), 5)
 
  mtx[2, 1] = a + 1
  mtx[3, 2] = b + 1
  mtx[4, 1] = a - 1
  mtx[5, 2] = b - 1
  mtx[6, 1] = a + 0.5
  mtx[7, 2] = b + 0.5
  mtx[8, 1] = a - 0.5
  mtx[9, 2] = b - 0.5
 
 
  return(mtx)
}
 
#unde vom afisa
primMtx = matrix(1:9, nrow = 9, ncol = 11)
colnames(primMtx) <- c("a",
                       "b",
                       "P(X < 3)",
                       "P(2 < X < 5)",
                       "P(3 < X < 4 | X > 2)",
                       "P(Y > 2)",
                       "P(4 < X < 6)",
                       "P(0 < X < 1 | X < 7)",
                       "P(X + Y < 5)",
                       "P(X ??? Y > 0.5)",
                       "P(X + Y > 3 | X ??? Y > 0.5)")
 
#trimitem parametrii a si b
primMtx = demonstratieEx3Prob4(2, 5, primMtx)
grid.arrange(top = "Afisarea comportamentului celor 9 functii \n pentru valori a si b alese", tableGrob(primMtx), nrow = 1)
```

<div>

<h1 class="forH1">

Rezolvare exercitiul 4 de la Problema 3

</h1>

</div>

<div class="afisare">

``` r
# Calculul celor 9 probabilitati cu ajutorul functiilor de sistem din R
 
#De aici in jos, rezolvarea e la fel ca punctu lanterior , singura diferenta este la calcularea integralei gamma(a, b) intre c si d
#Aici folosi functiile pgamma si pbeta
#pgamma(d, a, b): ne afla integrala inferioara pana la d pt gamma(a, b)
#pbeta(d, a, b): la fel insa pt integrala beta
#Daca vrem sa aflam integrala intre c si d, facem diferenta pgama(d, a, b) - pgamma(c, a, b) sau pbeta(d, a, b) - pbeta(c, a, b)
 
GamBetwSistem = function(a, b, c, d) {
  #gama intre c si d de parametir a b
  return(pgamma(d, a, b) - pgamma(c, a, b))
}
BetaBetwSistem = function(a, b, c, d) {
  #betaintre c si d de parametir a b
  return(pbeta(d, a, b) - pbeta(c, a, b))
}
fprobgamma1Sistem = function(a, b) {
  # P(0 < X < 3) : # Se cere P(X < 3). Este egal cu integrala Gama(a, b) incompleta intre 0 si 3 dar acum folosim functiile din sistem
  return (GamBetwSistem(a, b, 0, 3))
}
 
fprobgamma2Sistem = function(a, b) {
  # P(2 < X < 5) Integrala gama(a,b) incompleta intre 2 si 5.  FOlosim functii sistem
  return(GamBetwSistem(a, b, 2, 5))
}
 
fprobgamma3Sistem = function(a, b) {
  # ) P(3 < X < 4 | X > 2) . Integrala gama(a,b)incompleta(3, 4)/Integrala gama(a,b)incompleta superior 2 - fol functii sistem.
 
  return(GamBetwSistem(a, b, 3, 4) / GamBetwSistem(a, b, 2, Inf))
}
 
fprobbeta4Sistem = function(a, b) {
  # P(Y > 2) Integrala beta incompleta de 2 superioara
  return(BetaBetwSistem(a, b, 2, Inf))
}
fprobgamma5Sistem = function(a, b) {
  #Gama(a,b) incomplet intre 4 si 6
  return(GamBetwSistem(a, b, 4, 6))
}
fprobgamma6Sistem = function(a, b) {
  # P(0 < X < 1 | X < 7)
  #Gama(a,b)(0,1) / Gama(a,b)(0,7)
  return(GamBetwSistem(a, b, 0, 1) / GamBetwSistem(a, b, 0, 7))
}
 
fprodSistem = function(x, a, b) {
  return (GamAB(x, a, b) * BetaAB(x, a, b))
}
 
 
fint7Sistem = function(x, a, b) {
  return(integrate(
    Vectorize(fprodSistem),
    lower = 0,
    upper = 5 - x,
    a,
    b
  )$value)
}
fint8Sistem = function(x, a, b) {
  if (max(0, x - 0.5) > 1)
    return (0)
  #daca x-0.5 > 1 integrala ne da 0 (capat st>capat dr)
  return(integrate(
    Vectorize(fprodSistem),
    lower = max(0, x - 0.5),
    upper = min(1, x),
    a,
    b
  )$value)
}
fint9Sistem = function(x, a, b) {
  if (max(0, 3 - x) > 1)
    return (0)
    #daca 3-x>1 ne da 0
  return(integrate(
    Vectorize(fprodSistem),
    lower = max(0, 3 - x),
    upper = min(1, x),
    a,
    b
  )$value)
}
 
#Aici vor fi integrale duble .. exact ca la c) 
fprobnr7Sistem = function(a, b) {
  #integrala dubla, de la 0 la 5 la 0 la  5-x din acel produsdxdy
  return(integrate(
    Vectorize(fint7Sistem),
    lower = 0,
    upper = 5,
    a,
    b
  )$value)
}
 
fprobnr8Sistem = function(a, b) {
  #Integrala dubla
  val = integrate(Vectorize(fint8Sistem),
                  lower = 0,
                  upper = Inf,
                  a,
                  b)$value
  val = (1 - val)
  return(val)
}
fprobnr9Sistem = function(a, b) {
  #Integrala dubla
  up = integrate(Vectorize(fint9Sistem),
                 lower = 0,
                 upper = 3,
                 a,
                 b)$value
  down = fprobnr8Sistem(a, b)
 
  return (up / down)
}
 
umplereTabel = function(x, a, b, mtx) {
  #umplere cu valori de la c)
 
  mtx[1, 2] = fprobgamma1(a, b)
  mtx[2, 2] = fprobgamma2(a, b)
  mtx[3, 2] = fprobgamma3(a, b)
  mtx[4, 2] = fprobbeta4(a, b)
  mtx[5, 2] = fprobgamma5(a, b)
  mtx[6, 2] = fprobgamma6(a, b)
  mtx[7, 2] = fprobnr7(a, b)
  mtx[8, 2] = fprobnr8(a, b)
  mtx[9, 2] = fprobnr9(a, b)
 
  #umplere cu valori de la d)
  mtx[1, 3] = fprobgamma1Sistem(a, b)
  mtx[2, 3] = fprobgamma2Sistem(a, b)
  mtx[3, 3] = fprobgamma3Sistem(a, b)
  mtx[4, 3] = fprobbeta4Sistem(a, b)
  mtx[5, 3] = fprobgamma5Sistem(a, b)
  mtx[6, 3] = fprobgamma6Sistem(a, b)
  mtx[7, 3] = fprobnr7Sistem(a, b)
  mtx[8, 3] = fprobnr8Sistem(a, b)
  mtx[9, 3] = fprobnr9Sistem(a, b)
 
 
  return (mtx)
}
 
#unde vom afisa
primMtx = matrix(1:9, nrow = 9, ncol = 3)
colnames(primMtx) <- c("k",
                       "Rezultate c)",
                       "Rezultate d)")
 
#afisare
primMtx = umplereTabel(2, 3, 4, primMtx)
grid.arrange(top = "Valori comparative", tableGrob(primMtx), nrow = 1)
```

<img src="github_files/figure-gfm/unnamed-chunk-26-1.png" style="display: block; margin: auto;" />

</div>
